message: Just signed my official oath of office for the 115th Congress.  Excited for another two years of serving Southern Illinois!

Today is National Law Enforcement Appreciation Day. I hope that you will join me in celebrating the men and women who place themselves in harm’s way to keep our communities safe and secure. #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay

I believe it's time to put patients and doctors in control of health care decisions, not government bureaucrats.  Washington Democrats claim we have no ideas for replacing Obamacare.  Fair enough, here's 47 of them.

Today I am happy to welcome Steven Russel to my staff.  A retired Army Sergeant, Steven is participating in a fellowship program sponsored by the Wounded Warrior Fellowship Program.  He served 13 years in the U.S. Army, deployed to Bosnia and Iraq, and is a recipient of the Purple Heart and Bronze Star Medal with Valor device.  Steven will be based in our Belleville office, helping meet the needs of Southern Illinois' heroes.

I'm proud to announce that I've been appointed chairman of the House Veterans’ Affairs Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.  The responsibilities I will oversee as chairman include management of our national cemeteries, reforming the claim appeals process, and reviewing the quality and training methods of the Veterans Benefits Administration.  I'm honored to have this opportunity to serve America's heroes and can't wait to get to work in my new role.

Today marks 92 years since one of Southern Illinois' darkest days. Southern Illinois is not immune to the scourge of human trafficking, which funds international criminal networks and even terrorist groups and is a violation of basic human rights. Children are among the most vulnerable and innocent among us and deserve the highest protection of the law. That’s why I voted for H.R. 695, the Child Protection Improvements Act, which ensures that youth-serving organizations have access to national background checks on prospective staff and volunteers through the FBI’s database.
